mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_SEQ, B.BOARD_SEQ, B.CATEGORY_SEQ, P.USER_SEQ, UT.USER_NICKNAME, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_IMAGE, P.OLD_FILENAME, P.WDATE, BC.CATEGORY_NAME, B.BOARD_NAME, P.POST_DELETE, P.READCOUNT FROM POST P, BOARD B, BOARD_CATEGORY BC, USER_TABLE UT WHERE P.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ AND B.CATEGORY_SEQ= BC.CATEGORY_SEQ AND P.POST_SEQ = ${post_seq}
